title: John Doe
details: John is a certified personal trainer with 10 years of experience. Specializes in weight training and cardiovascular fitness.

title: Jane Smith
details: Jane is an expert in pilates and yoga. She has been helping clients achieve their flexibility goals for 8 years.

title: Robert Brown
details: Robert is skilled in high-intensity interval training (HIIT) and strength conditioning. He's been a personal trainer for 5 years and is passionate about helping clients reach their peak performance.
